sentences.en: ...a necessary congruence between political, cultural and economic forces.
sentences.cn: ...一种政治、文化和经济力量的必要相似。

sentences.en: A structure theorem between strong P - congruence pair and strong P - congruence is given.
sentences.cn: 给出了强P - 同余对和强P - 同余关系之间的结构定理.

sentences.en: A uniformly congruent security model is presented based on observational congruence.
sentences.cn: 基于观察同余等价,构造了一类一致同余安全模型.

sentences.en: For the rapid construction or congruence of Jane style refers to power provided a general approach.
sentences.cn: 为快速构造或化简同余幂指式提供了一般方法.

sentences.en: Furthermore theand the jointhe good congruence lattice are determined the semilattice of commutative cancellative monoids.
sentences.cn: 特别是确定了交换的可消幺半群的半格的好同余格上的交与并运算.

sentences.en: I must say that this push for congruence in all areas turned out beautifully.
sentences.cn: 我得说,在所有方面奋力争取一致性的结果是美妙的.

sentences.en: In this paper notation of a strongly ordered congruence on an ordered semigroup S is introduced.
sentences.cn: 设S是 有向序半群,本文给出了S上的一类正则同余,称为强序同余的定义及性质.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the self - consistency and congruence of the nursing staff.
sentences.cn: 目的了解护理人员 自我 和谐性的情况,以促进护理人员心理健康.

sentences.en: Stirrup joints ( congruence ) should be staggered in the last two of erect steel.
sentences.cn: 箍筋的接头 ( 弯钩叠合处 ) 应交错布置在两根架立钢筋上.

sentences.en: The paper analyzes the reasonable operation time passenger train by using congruence theory.
sentences.cn: 运用同余思想分析旅客列车的合理开车范围.

sentences.en: The semiring congruence on a class of generalized regular semiring S was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了一类广义正则半环S上的半环同余.

sentences.en: The subdirectly irreducible Clifford semigroups are characterized by means of the structure of congruence.
sentences.cn: 利用Clifford半群上同余的结构,刻画了次直积不可约的Clifford半 群.

words.tran_cn: 适合的，一致的；全等的；合谐的

trans.tran_en: Congruence is when two things are similar or fit together well
